cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
write_files:
  - path: /etc/network/interfaces
    content: |
      auto lo
      iface lo inet loopback
      auto eth0
      iface eth0 inet static
      address @@{APPLIANCE_IP}@@
      netmask @@{NETWORK_SUBNET_MASK}@@
      gateway @@{DEFAULT_NETWORK_GATEWAY}@@
      dns-nameservers 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4

action_list.description: Creates a ipsec tunnel to the virtual appliance (Aviatrix), so that on-premise VMs and servers can communicate with instances in created VPC with packet encryption and private ip addresses.
action_list.name: DataCenterExtension

attrs.script:
#script

account_name = "@@{CLOUD_ACCOUNT_NAME}@@"
avaitrix_ip = "@@{APPLIANCE_IP}@@"
new_avaitrix_password = "@@{AVIATRIX_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@"
vpc_name = "Aviatrix"
vpc_reg = "@@{VPC_REGION}@@"
vpc_size = "@@{GATEWAY_SIZE}@@"
vpc_net = "@@{VPC_CIDR}@@"

api_url = 'https://{0}/v1/api'.format(avaitrix_ip)
#print api_url


def setconfig(api_url, payload):
  r = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user='admin', passwd='passwd', params=payload, verify=False)
  resp = json.loads(r.content)
  if resp['return']:
    return resp
  else:
    print "Post request failed", r.content
    exit(1)

print "Get the session ID for making API operations"
payload = {'action': 'login', 'username': 'admin', 'password': new_avaitrix_password}
api_url1 = api_url + "?action=login&username=admin&password="+ new_avaitrix_password
cid = setconfig(api_url=api_url1, payload=payload)
cid = cid['CID']
print cid


print("Create VPC on AWS")
payload = {'CID': cid,
  'action': 'create_container',
  'account_name': account_name,
  'cloud_type': 1,
  'vpc_name': vpc_name,
  'vpc_reg': vpc_reg,
  'vpc_size': vpc_size,
  'internet_access': "yes",
  'public_subnet': "yes",
  'vpc_net': vpc_net
  }

resp = setconfig(api_url=api_url,payload=payload)

print resp

action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#script

if "@@{AVIATRIX_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@" == "@@{CONFIRM_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@":
  print "Confirm passwords are same"
else:
  print "Password and confirm password for admin are not same."
  exit(1)


sleep(300)
cust_id = '@@{CUSTOMER_ID}@@'
vpc_num = "@@{VPC_NUMBER}@@"
account_name = "@@{CLOUD_ACCOUNT_NAME}@@"
account_password = '@@{CLOUD_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD}@@'
account_email = '@@{CLOUD_ACCOUNT_EMAIL}@@'
aws_account_number = '@@{AWS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER}@@'
aws_access_key = '@@{AWS_ACCESS_KEY}@@'
aws_secret_key = '@@{AWS_SECRET_KEY}@@'
avaitrix_ip = "@@{APPLIANCE_IP}@@"
new_avaitrix_password = "@@{AVIATRIX_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@"

api_url = 'https://{0}/v1/api'.format(avaitrix_ip)
#print api_url



def setconfig(api_url, payload):
  r = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user='admin', passwd='passwd', params=payload, verify=False)
  resp = json.loads(r.content)
  if resp['return']:
    return resp
  else:
    print "Post request failed", r.content
    exit(1)

print "Get the session ID for making API operations"
payload = {'action': 'login', 'username': 'admin', 'password': avaitrix_ip}
api_url1 = api_url + "?action=login&username=admin&password="+ avaitrix_ip
cid = setconfig(api_url=api_url1, payload=payload)
cid = cid['CID']


print "Configure email id"
payload = {'action': 'add_admin_email_addr', 'admin_email': account_email , 'CID': cid}
api_url1 = api_url + "?action=add_admin_email_addr&admin_email="+account_email+"&CID="+ cid
resp = setconfig(api_url=api_url1, payload=payload)
print resp

print "Reset admin password"
payload = {'action': 'edit_account_user', 'account_name': 'admin', 'what': 'password', 'username': 'admin', 'old_password': avaitrix_ip,'new_password': new_avaitrix_password, 'CID': cid}
api_url1 = api_url + "?action=edit_account_user&account_name=admin&what=password&username=admin&old_password="+avaitrix_ip+"&new_password="+new_avaitrix_password+"&CID="+cid
resp = setconfig(api_url=api_url1, payload=payload)
print resp

print "Apply license"
payload = {'CID': cid, 'action': 'setup_customer_id', 'customer_id':cust_id}
api_url1 = api_url + "?action=setup_customer_id&CID="+cid+"&customer_id="+cust_id
resp = setconfig(api_url=api_url1, payload=payload)
print resp

print "Setup max VPC count"
payload = {'CID': cid, 'action': 'setup_max_vpc_containers', 'vpc_num':vpc_num}
api_url1 = api_url + "?action=setup_max_vpc_containers&CID="+cid+"&vpc_num="+vpc_num
resp = setconfig(api_url=api_url1, payload=payload)
print resp


print "Create AWS account"
payload = {'CID': cid,
  'action': 'setup_account_profile',
  'account_name': account_name,
  'account_password': account_password,
  'account_email': account_email,
  'cloud_type': 1,
  'aws_account_number': aws_account_number,
  'aws_access_key': aws_access_key,
  'aws_secret_key': aws_secret_key
  }

resp = setconfig(api_url=api_url, payload=payload)
print resp

#script

print "Please delete the created vpc from aviatrix manually"

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

#script

account_name = "@@{CLOUD_ACCOUNT_NAME}@@"
avaitrix_ip = "@@{APPLIANCE_IP}@@"

vpc_net = "@@{VPC_CIDR}@@"

#print api_url


def setconfig(api_url, payload):
  r = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user='admin', passwd='passwd', params=payload, verify=False)
  resp = json.loads(r.content)
  if resp['return']:
    return resp
  else:
    print "Post request failed", r.content
    exit(1)

print "Get the session ID for making API operations"

api_url1 = api_url + "?action=login&username=admin&password="+ new_avaitrix_password

print cid


print("Create VPC on AWS")
payload = {'CID': cid,
  'action': 'create_container',
  'account_name': account_name,
  'cloud_type': 1,
  'vpc_name': vpc_name,
  'vpc_reg': vpc_reg,
  'vpc_size': vpc_size,

print resp

#script

if "@@{AVIATRIX_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@" == "@@{CONFIRM_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@":

else:
  print "Password and confirm password for admin are not same."
  exit(1)


sleep(300)
cust_id = '@@{CUSTOMER_ID}@@'
vpc_num = "@@{VPC_NUMBER}@@"
account_name = "@@{CLOUD_ACCOUNT_NAME}@@"

account_email = '@@{CLOUD_ACCOUNT_EMAIL}@@'
aws_account_number = '@@{AWS_ACCOUNT_NUMBER}@@'
aws_access_key = '@@{AWS_ACCESS_KEY}@@'
aws_secret_key = '@@{AWS_SECRET_KEY}@@'

new_avaitrix_password = "@@{AVIATRIX_ADMIN_PASSWORD}@@"

api_url = 'https://{0}/v1/api'.format(avaitrix_ip)

def setconfig(api_url, payload):

  resp = json.loads(r.content)
  if resp['return']:

api_url1 = api_url + "?action=setup_customer_id&CID="+cid+"&customer_id="+cust_id

print resp

print "Setup max VPC count"

print resp


print "Create AWS account"

  'action': 'setup_account_profile',
  'account_name': account_name,
  'account_password': account_password,
  'account_email': account_email,
  'cloud_type': 1,
  'aws_account_number': aws_account_number,
  'aws_access_key': aws_access_key,
  'aws_secret_key': aws_secret_key
  }

resp = setconfig(api_url=api_url, payload=payload)
print resp
